Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Sclerotinia sclerotiorum (MIC=32.4 µg/ml after 288 hours), Botrytis cinerea (MIC=10.8 µg/ml after 288 hours),Fusarium solani, Aspergillus fumigatus, Geotrichum candidum.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.18599825] It has less cytotoxicity against human PBMCs.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Colutellin A, an immunosuppressive peptide from Colletotrichum dematium.
Literature.Author: Ren Y, Strobel GA, Graff JC, Jutila M, Park SG, Gosh S, Teplow D, Condron M, Pang E, Hess WM, Moore E.
